price: 38. Kulli seehadayti keenik, Yalli waara niqmat le j armat ise culsaamah sangeelaa?
arabic: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ayaṭmaʿu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yud'khala jannata naʿīmin
